sentences.sContent: He also wore a pair of suspenders.

synos.tran: 吊裤带；裤子背带（suspender的复数）

trans.tranCn: 吊裤带；裤子背带（suspender的复数）
trans.tranOther: Suspenders are a pair of straps that go over someone's shoulders and are fastened to their trousers at the front and back to prevent the trousers from falling down
